short_summary: Request for Proposals for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply in various categories including Independent Information Technology Project Review Team Leader and Independent Information Technology Project Reviewer.
tags: Independent Information Technology Project Review Team Leader
Require Canadian Service Providers to Register
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement for Independent Review Services
#### Request for Proposal
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites selected contractors to submit a request for proposal (RFP) for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply. The proposed project involves providing independent review services for information technology projects.

#### Invitation to Bid
Only selected TBIPS SA Holders currently holding a TBIPS SA for Tier 1 in the National Capital Region under the EN578-170432 series of SAs are invited to bid. To be eligible, contractors must be a registered supplier under the TBIPS SA and have the necessary qualifications and experience to perform the work.

#### Description of Services
The successful contractor will be required to provide independent review services for Project Review Teams, focusing on the following categories:

*   Project Review Team Leader (P.13)
*   Project Reviewer (P.14)

#### Notice Details

*   **Reference Number:** WS3952909490-Doc3979510792
*   **Amendment Number:** 9
*   **Publication Date:** April 25, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** May 23, 2023, 14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** May 17, 2023
